[00:00.00]Under The Mistletoe - Kelly Clarkson (凯丽.克拉克森)/Brett Eldredge
[00:02.94]Lyrics by：Aben Eubanks/Kelly Clarkson
[00:05.89]Every time I look around this room
[00:08.87]My eyes they tend to fall on you and I confess
[00:13.05]Nothing but you makes sense
[00:16.52]Memories fill my heart and I can barely keep my tears
[00:20.93]From fallin' oh I want your love
[00:23.87]Do you ever think of us
[00:26.99]Is it too late too late to open up
[00:29.83]I'm dyin' to say oh how I love you
[00:32.76]You're workin' towards me now
[00:36.17]What am I gonna say
[00:37.59]Push my pride aside
[00:40.32]When I close my eyes
[00:42.93]It's just you and I
[00:46.29]Here under the mistletoe
[00:48.46]Magic fills the air
[00:50.87]Standin' over there
[00:53.64]Santa hear my prayer
[00:57.07]Here under the mistletoe
[00:59.60]All I want hey yeah
[01:02.06]All I want hey-hey yeah
[01:04.70]All I want hey yeah
[01:07.71]Is under the mistletoe
[01:10.31]Oh everything I try to keep you from gettin' inside
[01:15.06]Works until I see your face
[01:17.77]I linger hopin' you might stay
[01:21.31]Wrapped up in your arms is where
[01:23.67]I wanna spend my nights so hard how much I want you
[01:27.03]Do you think of us
[01:29.10]How I want your love
[01:31.95]Is it too late too late
[01:33.44]To let you know I can't quite escape
[01:36.13]How much I need you
[01:37.40]You're workin' towards me now
[01:40.77]What am I gonna say
[01:42.37]Push my pride aside
[01:44.99]When I close my eyes
[01:47.55]It's just you and I
[01:50.94]Here under the mistletoe
[01:53.13]Magic fills the air
[01:55.61]Standin' over there
[01:58.30]Santa hear my prayer
[02:01.71]Here under the mistletoe
[02:04.33]All I want hey yeah
[02:05.68]All I really really ever want
[02:07.04]All I want hey-hey yeah
[02:08.46]All I really really ever want
[02:09.56]All I want hey yeah
[02:11.08]All I really really ever want
[02:12.60]Is under the mistletoe
[02:16.44]You're walkin' towards me now
[02:21.47]Won't you read my mind somehow
[02:24.98]Oh oh oh
[02:26.19]Meet me in the middle underneath a little bit of mistletoe
[02:29.03]And indecision take a breath as I
[02:30.77]Push my pride aside
[02:33.48]When I close my eyes
[02:36.13]It's just you and I
[02:39.50]Here under the mistletoe

[02:44.23]Standin' over there

[02:52.06]'Cause all I want hey yeah

[03:07.73]All I really really ever want

data.trans:
[ti:Under The Mistletoe]
[ar:Kelly Clarkson/Brett Eldredge]
[al:Under The Mistletoe]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.94]//
[00:05.89]每当我在这个房间里张望
[00:08.87]我的视线总是会落在你身上 我承认
[00:13.05]只有你最重要
[00:16.52]我的心中充满回忆 眼泪
[00:20.93]止不住地滑落 我想要你的爱
[00:23.87]你有没有想过我们的事
[00:26.99]现在表明我的心意 是不是太晚了
[00:29.83]我好想对你说 我是多么的爱你
[00:32.76]你现在渐渐靠近我
[00:36.17]我要说什么呢
[00:37.59]放下我的自尊
[00:40.32]当我闭上双眼
[00:42.93]只有你和我
[00:46.29]在这槲寄生下
[00:48.46]空气中充满了魔法气息
[00:50.87]站在那里
[00:53.64]圣诞老人听到了我的祈祷
[00:57.07]在这槲寄生下
[00:59.60]我想要的全部
[01:02.06]我想要的全部
[01:04.70]我想要的全部
[01:07.71]都在这槲寄生下
[01:10.31]我想方设法 不让你走进我的心里
[01:15.06]但见到你的脸那一刻 我彻底沦陷
[01:17.77]我犹豫着 希望你能留下来
[01:21.31]我想躺在你的怀抱里
[01:23.67]度过无数个夜晚 我多么想要拥有你
[01:27.03]你是否会想起我们的事
[01:29.10]我多想拥有你的爱
[01:31.95]是不是太晚了
[01:33.44]能否让你明白 我逃不脱这魔咒
[01:36.13]我多么需要你
[01:37.40]你现在渐渐靠近我
[01:40.77]我要说什么呢
[01:42.37]放下我的自尊
[01:44.99]当我闭上双眼
